name: react-native-rating-request
description: A React Native component to prompt users for a rating after positive interactions

scripts.prep-example: cd example && yarn && cd ../ && mkdir -p example/node_modules/react-native-rating-request/ && tar -c --exclude .git --exclude example . | tar -x -C example/node_modules/react-native-rating-request/ && cd example && react-native link react-native-rating-request
scripts.example-ios: npm run prep-example; cd example; react-native run-ios
scripts.example-android: npm run prep-example; cd example; react-native run-android

author: Sandro Caseiro
